post_title: FS PSA 2-4: Adkins, Bergen, Gray, Lentz, McCauley, Miller, Moeller, Wilhelm
post_content:

Molly Miller Old Mill PSA 2.5 – [URL="https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=2372426"]moved[/URL]
Dan Moeller Polar Bear PSA 2 – sold
Kaiser Wilhelm batting Polar Bear PSA 2.5 – [URL="https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=2372426"]moved[/URL]

I'll kick in shipping.

To get a higher resolution image (from the Edge browser), right click on the image and hit "Open image in new tab." That'll take you to the hosted image, and you can either magnify or download.
